thread.title: Chrissy Teigen dances against John Legend at Grammys
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen dances against John Legend at Grammys | Daily Mail Online

author: Leeor Samocha For Dailymail.com
title: Chrissy Teigen dances against John Legend at Grammys
text:
They're the definition of couple goals.
And Chrissy Teigen, 31, and John Legend, 38, made a showstopping entrance at the 59th Grammy Awards inside the Staples Center, Los Angeles, on Sunday night.
The loved-up couple passionately danced down the red carpet much to the delight of fans and the media.
Scroll down for video
Dirty dancing! Chrissy Teigen, 31, and John Legend, 38, made a showstopping entrance at the 59th Grammy Awards inside the Staples Center, Los Angeles, on Sunday night
Known for her exuberant personality, Chrissy didn't hold back as she draped her arms around John's neck and closed her eyes.
As she raised her arms into the air, John placed his hands on her hips and pursed his lips in appreciation.
The fun-loving pair couldn't help but smile as they put on the romantic display which also saw Chrissy show off her curves in a stunning cut out gown.
Hold me: The loved-up couple passionately danced down the red carpet much to the delight of fans and the media
Fun couple: John checked out his gorgeous wife as she sashayed around for him
Going for it: Known for her exuberant personality, Chrissy didn't hold back as she draped her arms around John's neck and closed her eyes
Chrissy's edgy gown featured an array of textures and styles - the black see-through lace hinted at the cover girl's fit frame, while black crochet detailing cinched in her waist and gave a body-con effect.
The neckline was strapped together with black string to create a trendy choker look and was further embellished with green-tinted feathers.
The long-sleeved number also included fringe on the hem and tail of the dress.
Cleaning up well: Chrissy looked stunning in a black strappy gown
Stunning: The Sports Illustrated model's makeup consisted of a dark smokey eye with a sharp black liner emphasizing Chrissy's honey eyes and a nude-peach glossy lip
Teigen paired the intricate dress with simple black barely-there heeled sandals and a gold metallic clutch with red accents.
The Sports Illustrated model's makeup matched the ensemble perfectly and consisted of a dark smokey eye with a sharp black liner emphasizing Chrissy's honey eyes and a nude-peach glossy lip.
Her balayage hair was styled by celebrity stylist Jen Atkin, who cut her brunette tresses to shoulder length and styled them in a wet-look beach wave fashion with a deep side part.
Edgy: Chrissy's gown featured an array of textures and styles - including the black see-through lace and black crochet detailing
Make a statement in a black lace up maxi dress like Chrissy in Roberto Cavalli Roberto Cavalli Spring 2017 dress
Shop Roberto Cavalli
Buy now
The 2017 Grammys were a veritable sarotrial feast with all the stars going head to head on the red carpet, as well as in the music stakes!
One of our favourite looks of the evening was Chrissy Teigen's! Attending with her ten time winning husband, the model looked super sexy on the red carpet in a cut-out sheer Roberto Cavalli gown with feathers motif lace throughout.
Chrissy's dress is straight off the Cavalli Spring 2017 runway and not available to buy yet, however you can follow the link on the right to hop the current collection at Net-a-Porter, then recreate the look with one of the black lace up maxis from our edit below.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET ONE LIKE IT £275 The Jetset Diaries Novella Lace Up Maxi Dress at ASOS (reduced to £125)

Meanwhile, her husband and father of her nearly one-year-old daughter Luna was dashing in a black two-piece shirt and a salmon button-down with a matching tie.
Despite the sexy number draped over the beauty's enviable curves and her cool new haircut, fans seemed more concerned about whether she had got the green tint off her fingers from the previous day's Fun Dip incident.
Chrissy and John stopped to talk to E! on the red carpet, where Chrissy explained: 'I had a Fun Dip incident and I ate them with my fingers,' she explained, 'I know you're supposed to use the stick, but I used the stick as an appetizer.'
Beauty fiasco: Chrissy and John stopped to talk to E! on the red carpet, where Chrissy explained the aforementioned incident
Parents' night out: Meanwhile, her husband and father of her nearly one-year-old daughter Luna was dashing in a black two-piece shirt and a salmon button-down with a matching tie
To which John reacted by laughing, saying: 'She uh...eats like a toddler.'
Chrissy's beauty fiasco led to her trending on Twitter during the Grammys, with users wanting to know the outcome of the accident.
One Quote: : 'I have zero interest in watching the #grammys2017 & don't know most of these artists. Just watching to see @chrissyteigen green hand.'
Veteran: Legend is not nominated at this year's ceremony, however, the 10-time Grammy winner is set to perform onstage with Cynthia Erivo
Another commented: 'Hey @Chrissyteigen, how did you deshrek yourself? #FunDipProblems'
Chrissy, notorious for live-tweeting Hollywood award shows, took to Twitter to react: 'No one will stop asking about my green fingers.'
Before heading into the ceremony, Legend and Teigen enjoyed a private dance party - effectively steaming up the red carpet.
Couple goals: The parents-of-one looked very much in love as they took in the award ceremony
'I am melting!' Chrissy excitedly tweeted about the moment she got to chat with her 'goddess' Jennifer Lopez
Legend is not nominated at this year's ceremony, however, the 10-time Grammy winner is set to perform onstage with Cynthia Erivo.
The duo will perform the classic beach boys song God Only Knows.
